actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit federally supported experimentation on human subjects of biomedical and behavioral research without their informed consent.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits federally supported experimentation on human subjects of biomedical and behavioral research without their informed consent. States that informed consent shall consist of knowledge of procedures and chemicals to be used, the risks involved, and an instruction to the subject that he is free to discontinue participation in the project at any time.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit federally supported experimentation on human subjects of biomedical and behavioral research without their informed consent.
